means: 有鉴别能力的，有识别能力的
分别，辨别，区分( discriminate的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: More discriminating visitors now tend to shun the area.
sentence.Network_cn: 更有鉴别力的游客现在往往避开该地区。

sentence.Network_en: Due caution should be exercised in discriminating between the two.
sentence.Network_cn: 在区别这两者时应该相当谨慎.

sentence.Network_en: Many businesses are accused of discriminating against women.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多企业被控有歧视妇女的做法.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(D) ... discriminate 歧视 discriminating 有差别的 discriminatingly 有辨别力地.
心理学专业词汇翻译辞典 - MBA智库文档 ... discriminated operant 辨别操作 discriminating 辨别的 discriminating power 鉴别力.
... workmanship n. 工艺 discriminating a. 有识别力的，敏锐的 representative n. 代表，代理.
discriminating relay 谐振继电器discriminating 有区别的discrimination 区别

list.abs: 项目管理术语英汉对照表 - MBA智库百科 ... Discrete Task 离散任务 Discrimination 歧视 Discussion 讨论.
大学英语六级词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... discourse n． 演讲；论文 discrimination n． 辨别；识别力；歧视 disgrace n． 失宠，耻辱，丢脸.
英语词汇-数学词汇_专业词汇 ... discrete uniform distribution 离散均匀分布 discriminant 判别式 disjoint 不相交的.
...与行为类似于属性的类相联系的值；也就是说，它的每个实例都有唯一的值。见鉴别器(discriminator)、角色名(rolename)语义

entry.tran: 有识别力的;有鉴赏力的;敏锐的
entry.def: Someone who is discriminating has the ability to recognize things that are of good quality.

example.ex: More discriminating visitors now tend to shun the area.
example.tran: 更有鉴别力的游客现在往往避开该地区。

means.word_mean: 1. showing or indicating careful judgment and discernment especially in matters of taste;
2. marked by the ability to see or make fine distinctions;
3. having or demonstrating ability to recognize or draw fine distinctions;

sentences.sentence: "an acute observer of politics and politicians"
"as sharp and incisive as the stroke of a fang"

auth_sentence.content: Swan said the policy is more discriminating than that.
auth_sentence.res_content: Swan said the policy is more discriminating than that.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Swan said the policy is more discriminating than that.

auth_sentence.content: Discriminating offence from merit by such dim and ambulant boundaries.
auth_sentence.res_content: Discriminating offence from merit by such dim and ambulant boundaries.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Discriminating offence from merit by such dim and ambulant boundaries.

auth_sentence.content: This encourages some people's prejudiced attitudes and discriminating behaviours.
auth_sentence.res_content: This encourages some people's prejudiced attitudes and discriminating behaviours.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This encourages some people's prejudiced attitudes and discriminating behaviours.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"状态物品,行业等"; 2. 表介词,"在……情况下……"; 3. 表形容词,"正……的或令人……的"; 4. "……的"

stems_affixes.word_buile: advertise做广告+ing行业→n.广告业;广告活动 adj.广告的;广告业务的
assume假装,假定+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.傲慢的,不逊的,僭越的
change变化+ing正……的或令人……的→正在变化的
correspond通信;符合+ing……的→adj.相应的,通讯的
discriminate辨别,歧视+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.有辨别能力的
encourage鼓励+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.鼓舞人心的
endure持久,持续+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.持久的,不朽的
engross吸引+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.引人入胜的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 非常的,极度的,胜过的,过度的
stems_affixes.word_buile: exceed超出+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.非常的,极度的,胜过的,过度的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 令人兴奋的,使人激动的
stems_affixes.word_buile: excite使兴奋+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.令人兴奋的,使人激动的
exhilarate使高兴+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.使人兴奋的
fascinate使……入迷+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.迷人的,吸引人的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 谄媚的,讨人欢喜的,奉承的
stems_affixes.word_buile: flatter阿谀,奉承+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.谄媚的,讨人欢喜的,奉承的
forego居先+ing……的→adj.在前的,前述的
hard艰难+work工作+ing……的→adj.苦干的,不辞辛劳的
increase增加+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.日益增加的,增大的
inspire鼓舞+ing令人……的→inspiring灌输的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有趣味的,令人好奇[或注意]的
stems_affixes.word_buile: interest使发生兴趣,引起……的注意+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.有趣味的,令人好奇[或注意]的
invite邀请+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.诱人的,引人入胜的
out出+go走+ing正……的或令人……的→走出来→心胸宽→待人友善的
precede先于+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.在前的,前述的
promise允许,答应+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.有希望的,有前途的
refresh使清新+ing令人……的→adj.使心神爽快的
rivet铆钉,固定+ing正……的或令人……的→如铆钉一样把人钉[吸引]住→非常精彩的
threaten恐吓,威胁+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.胁迫的,危险的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 欠缺的,没有的,不够格的
stems_affixes.word_buile: want想+ing……的→想要的→欠缺的
account计算+ing状态物品,行业等→n.会计学
advertise做广告+ing行业→n.广告业;广告活动 adj.广告的;广告业务的
bank银行+ing状态物品,行业等→n.银行业
begin开始,首先+ing状态→n.开始
build建造+ing物→n.建筑[物],房屋,大楼 [同]structure
cloth布+ing物→n.服装,被褥
dance跳舞+ing状态物品,行业等→dancing舞蹈
engineer工程师+ing状态物品,行业等→n.工程[学]
feel感觉+ing状态→n.感情;心情;知觉;同情
fill填充+ing状态物品,行业等→n.充填物,馅
fish鱼+ing状态物品,行业等→n.钓鱼,捕鱼
floor地板+ing物→n.地板材料,铺地板

stems_affixes.value_cn: 立足处;稳固的地位,基础

open开+ing状态物品,行业等→n.开,开放,开始

proceed进行+ing正……的或令人……的→行动,进行
